reuo.resources
Class Sound

java.lang.Object
  reuo.resources.Sound

public class Sound
extends Object

Describes the name and waveform data of a Sound. The sample frequency of the sound waveform is always 22Khz (22,050), the sample resolution is always 16-bit, and is always Mono (1 channel).

Author:
Kristopher Ives

Method Detail

toString

public String toString()
Overrides:
toString in class Object

getName

public String getName()
Gets the name of the sound. (typically this is a filename such as foosound.wav, although the getData method does not return a WAVE file)

Returns:
the name of the sound

getData

public ByteBuffer getData()
Gets the wave data of the sound. This does not include the WAVE header, but only the waveform data with the format described in the class description.c

Returns:
the wave data
